thread.title: BRIEF-Lpi Capital Bhd Says Qtrly Profit Attributable 83 Mln RGT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lpi Capital Bhd Says Qtrly Profit Attributable 83 Mln RGT

organizations.name: brief-lpi capital bhd says qtrly profit attributable

text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Lpi Capital Bhd:
* QTRLY REVENUE ‍​363.5 MILLION RGT * QTRLY PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE 83 MILLION RGT * DECLARED SECOND INTERIM DIVIDEND OF 45.0 SEN PER SHARE‍​ * YEAR AGO QTRLY REVENUE 355.6 MILLION RGT; YEAR AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT 81.5 MILLION RGT‍​ Source text :( bit.ly/2mes2ZH ) Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
